column1: The Purple Pig////The place was packed around 2 PM
column2: so I kind of felt like I was in the way just standing around waiting around the bar area but the workers were all friendly and accommodating. They have an extensive wine
column3: cocktail and beer list to enjoy while you wait or with your meal. Our table was ready a little sooner than expected and luckily sat at our own table rather than the communal tables.
